name: Country Rock
description: Combination of contemporary Rock with more traditional American Country.

children.name: Cosmic Country
children.description: Synthesizes various American musical influences and the exploratory ethoses of Psychedelia and Progressive Country to create an ethereal and more experimental sound still rooted in traditional Country.
